tweets.text: A community in Staffordshire are living with doors & windows taped up.Nose bleeds, breathing issues, toxic fumes from the landfill site @WalleysL run by @RedIndustries2  The @EnvAgency have found the company  'in breach' but v little action #socialjustice  https://t.co/DehURqq0oi
@davemh72 @SianieRoo @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK The whole story stinks, literally but this is a health hazard

@SianieRoo @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @JuliaBradbury I really don't believe in conspiracies but something isn't sitting right over this . At least two other landfills closed over complaints and breaches yet the most complained about one isn't .
Last Friday I reported the smell in Basford via the @EnvAgency website, but still no reference number.  Are these reports even being properly recorded? #stopthestink

@BBCRadioStoke One does wonder just how many permit breaches @EnvAgency are going to erm.. permit! This is getting ridiculous now, @RedIndustries2 breach the permit, the EA gives them 6 weeks to fix it, then another breach. We are going round in circles here!

Come and visit us @pow_rebecca - you may reconsider your 'rotting egg smell' comment and realise people of Newcastle-under-Lyme are struggling to breathe &suffering a multitude of health effects as a result of hydrogen sulphide. @EnvAgency dereliction of duty https://t.co/ewXMbpMqAF

tweets.text:
Community of #NewcastleUnderLyme invited to an online engagement event on Weds 26 May at 4pm

If you're affected by odour from #WalleysQuarry it's a chance to find out about our regulation of the site, ask us questions & for us to hear from you

Details ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/2RIZhtFy3Z https://t.co/EuQy5giryf

@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids So, you are very sorry we‚Äôre still suffering? That‚Äôs ok then! üò° If you were doing ‚Äòeverything in your power‚Äô then you‚Äôd fine @RedIndustries2 and get someone in who knows how to manage a waste site without all these permit breeches. How many more chances? https://t.co/NTlu7PVxru

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids It stunk over 3.5 miles away in Hanford last night, seems to be  just as bad as before the "capping" .
Isn't it odd how in the last 2 weeks 6 trucks have been turned away, may I ask how many were turned away in the previous 52 weeks? and does that figure seem right as an average?
This is the CSO running into our Bathing Status designated site today yuk @YorkshireWater @EnvAgency https://t.co/iCMkycnKiy

@BBCRadioStoke How many chances are they going to be given by @EnvAgencyMids seriously? It's breach after breach and no fines for non compliance of their permit, meanwhile we continue to suffer. Sorry EA this is not good enough.
@JuliaBradbury @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg

@SianieRoo @scottdegg @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @JuliaBradbury can't go on until end of September with survey after survey, we need that place closing for good, @ClareDinnisEA if you think you are surveying your way into 2026 think again, you're personally responsible for our ill health, hope you're thinking of us 3am cos we're thinking of u

Cigarette butts are among the most commonly discarded pieces of waste globally.

#CommitToQuit¬†- ¬†save your #health ‚ô•Ô∏è & the #environment üå≥ #WNTD2021 https://t.co/TG25p7jX9D

@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Here is one of my eyelids (stye again, same other eye) after another 3:45am wake up caused by the foul smell inside my house ST52PX last night. Absolutely not ok. We don‚Äôt have the luxury of more time, 8 months of this is exhausting https://t.co/NY41akh0Kj
Silverdale stink: Permit breaches found at landfill site https://t.co/2ZN9rgAJCp

@SianieRoo @dallydood @BBCRadioStoke @redindustries oh good god thats 9 or 10 in total , come on @EnvAgencyMids enough is enough shut the damn place down ........ NOW before someone get seriously ill or god forbid dies !!!!
@tayz_BETH @JuliaBradbury @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency They can't ignoring you if we all try and get the message out there #stopthestink

Big thank you to @OliverHarmarEA Yorkshire area director @EnvAgencyYNE for helping to make a new video with partners about our #NFM in #Calderdale project.

Don't miss him introducing it at our #Confluence2021 Plenary event on Tuesday 8 June.
https://t.co/QXNOqg9F3w @Calderdale https://t.co/Xj1BjnWsTx
@bbcmtd Correction. Even more permit breaches. Yet again @EnvAgencyMids and @ClareDinnisEA do absolutely nothing.

A community in Staffordshire are living with doors & windows taped up.Nose bleeds, breathing issues, toxic fumes from the landfill site @WalleysL run by @RedIndustries2  The @EnvAgency have found multiple breaches but still operating #socialjustice  #toxic #waste #healthissue https://t.co/46NZiPGPPf
@JuliaBradbury @WeggSarah @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency Thank you @WeggSarah xxx

@JuliaBradbury @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids negligence,no regulation,no root cause ,no leadership @JamesBevanEA  @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca just make it up as you go alongüò≥How can the site be allowed to accept waste with 10 permit breach since January? tweets.text: @JuliaBradbury @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency I live in Silverdale . It absolutely stinks!! Its vile! It's warming up next I'm dreading it üòí
@JuliaBradbury @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency stinks for miles around, i live 5 miles away and can still smell it 4-5/7 times a week

@JuliaBradbury @davemh72 @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK It‚Äôs starting to feel like a cover up Julia, high levels of methane as well and particulate matter which can be very hazardous to health.They think we will pipe down but we won‚Äôt. @wellycath @StinkStopthe @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids got ours in Keele  thanks to the person who delivered it

It is not getting any better. The gas stink from the landfill is increasing in intensity. A dreadful weekend and again tonight. No one should have to live like this. We are all looking for answers from @EnvAgencyMids and light at the end of this tunnel. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/JPdHJZJBqQ

There have been five further permit breaches at Walleys Quarry landfill in Newcastle, which has been at the centre of thousands of complaints about a smell. 

The Environment Agency has said the operators have been told to carry out more works. https://t.co/xbcclA1so6

Why do you lie @ClareDinnisEA &say you‚Äôre doing everything to u can when you have not financially penalised them or revoked their permit despite 5 new permit breaches released today? #stopthestink @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @JuliaBradbury https://t.co/QKk7QinZsi

This stink is a major disaster and I urge all leaders to lead and not hide behind the bull the EA say.  The people of newcastle will back you.  Stop this stink

@Samanth33412592 @poppers82 @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe I don't know what is worse when it's constantly smelling or when we get that all important break from the smell. Either way the anxiety it's starting cause is unreal. I've never wanted more or escape as much as I do now üòî

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe I‚Äôve been grateful of a brake dew to wind direction, but the anxiety I have over when it will be back how bad will it be is off the scale I dread going to bed in case I wake choking on it affected even when no gas in my home #StopTheStink

Just delivered some #StoptheStink leaflets round the estate. A shame that it's necessary for us to have to do this, @NewsNBC, & @EnvAgencyMids, we shouldn't have to endure this ongoing #AirPollution incident üí©üí©üí© https://t.co/ZaJHGBuDLm

Cant open windows, cant enjoy outdoors, actually we cant breathe.
@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca @NewsNBC @StaffordshireCC It is INTOLERABLE. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/gTeInWpQuW
